clientfacade

Class Facade

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • clientfacade.Facade

  • public class Facade
extends java.util.Observable
    The Facade class controls all interactions between the GUI and the CatanModel
    Version:
    1.0 Build Jan, 2016.
    Author:
    Christian Riboldi, Clayton Condie, Jacob Brewer, Joshua Powers, Joshua Van Steeter

      • createGame

        public static GameInfo createGame(boolean randomTiles,
                                  boolean randomNumbers,
                                  boolean randomPorts,
                                  java.lang.String title)
                           throws ServerException
        Creates a new game with a specific title
        Parameters:
        randomTiles - boolean representing whether the new game should have random tiles
        randomNumbers - boolean representing whether the new game should have random Number tiles
        randomPorts - boolean representing whether the new game should have random Port locations
        title - string creates the human readable title
        Returns:
        Game infor from the proxy
        Throws:
        ServerException

      • joinGame

        public static void joinGame(int gameId,
                            CatanColor color,
                            boolean justCreatedGame)
                     throws ServerException
        Joins a new game from the game list
        Parameters:
        gameId - The gameId from the join game menu
        color - CatanColor represntation of the color the player would like to join with
        Throws:
        ServerException

      • hasGameStarted

        public static boolean hasGameStarted()
        Will return false if either the player has not joined a game yet, or the joined game does not have four players yet. Otherwise return true.
        Returns:
        Whether game has started.

      • howManyPlayers

        public static int howManyPlayers(CatanModel model)
        Returns the number of players that have already joined the game. Used to check the poll if another player has joined.
        Returns:
        Number of non null players in the model
